Link to the documentation

Under this link you will find a documentation about Component Stacking.

How to change Z-Index

Do it locally:

  1. Change Z-Index for every component sepratelly or dissable it:

  1. In this example buttons have higher Z-Index than the table:

Or do it globally:

  1. With a Page or Section selected, go to the Layout Pane tab in the Properties window on the left,

  1. Go to the Z-Index order-Edit.
    Here you will find a list of all components on the page or section.

  1. If you have placed multiple components in the same areas, dragging them up and down the list will change which one is displayed topmost and so on.
